title: Rescue of boy in well ends in tragedy
Deadly hookah lounge shooting in Virginia
description: Multiple people were hospitalized after a shooting late Friday at a hookah lounge near the campus of Virginia Tech in downtown Blacksburg, police said.

title: Trump's January 6 pardon pledge baffles some attorneys
description: Donald Trump's pledge to pardon January 6 rioters may help fire up his supporters, but several defendants facing federal charges say they no longer believe the former President's promises.

title: France is on a collision course with its Muslim population
Escape from Kabul: One Afghan family's tale of heartbreak and rescue
description: It was August 26 in Kabul, just barely evening, and Nasema was holding on tightly to two of the most important things in her life, not knowing that she would lose one of them before the sun completely set.

title: Some 50 Iranian MPs test positive for Covid-19 as Omicron rages, says lawmaker
description: Some 50 members of Iran's 290-seat parliament have contracted Covid-19, a senior MP said on Saturday as the Omicron variant spreads unabated across the country.

title: Brazilians protest over Congolese immigrant beaten to death
description: Protesters gathered across Brazil on Saturday to demand justice for Moise Kabagambe, whose family say he was beaten to death after asking for unpaid wages.

title: Norway off to golden start as China claims first gold
description: Having arrived in China as the most successful country in Winter Olympics history, Norway was quickly into the groove on day one of Beijing 2022 as the Nordic country got off to a golden start on Saturday.

title: Why a toxic volcanic lake on Earth reminds scientists of Mars
description: Earth may be the only planet we know of with a dazzling array of life, but that doesn't mean our world is always a friendly one.

title: France launches inquiry after spill of over 100,000 dead fish off Atlantic coast
description: A spill of more than 100,000 dead fish in the Atlantic Ocean off the French coast has been described by the French Maritime Minister as "shocking" in an incident that has drawn the attention of environmental activist groups.

title: Erdogan and wife test positive for Covid-19
description: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan and his wife, Emine, have tested positive for Covid-19.

title: 'Pam & Tommy' sex tape docudrama is oddly nostalgic
description: I have a theory that Pamela Anderson and Tommy Lee's sex tape helped to usher in the age of social media, with all the darker ills that come with public (over)exposure.

title: Queen hosts reception on eve of Platinum Jubilee
description: Britain's Queen Elizabeth II marked the eve of her Platinum Jubilee with a special reception at Sandringham House on Saturday.

title: China's human-made snow is part of a 'dangerous' trend
description: It would be hard to hold a conversation over the deafening sound of the snow machines preparing the Olympic venues northwest of Beijing. They are loud and they are everywhere, blowing snow across what will be this month's most-watched slopes.

title: What athletes think of artificial snow at the Olympics
description: For the first time, the climate crisis has forced the Olympic Winter Games in Beijing to be virtually 100% reliant on artificial snow. CNN's Rene Marsh reports.

title: Decapitated skeletons of Roman 'criminals' found during rail excavation
description: About 40 decapitated skeletons unearthed by a group of archaeologists in southern England are thought to belong to "criminals" from the Roman period, researchers say.

title: A side of London you won't see on postcards
description: Tucked away down a back street in one of London's surviving artist quarters, Jock McFadyen's studio is just off the popular London Fields park in the city's East End.

title: The youngest and oldest Winter Olympians competing at Beijing 2022
description: They say age is just a number and that's certainly true when it comes to the Winter Olympics.

title: Iceland says it will end whaling from 2024
description: Iceland says it will end whaling from 2024 amid dwindling demand and continuing controversy.

title: Whoopi Goldberg's baffling claim forced many to ask tough questions about race and identity in the US
No Covid restrictions, 81% of citizens vaccinated, and welcoming visitors
description:
Tourism will bounce back in 2022
Travel and tourism to return to almost pre-pandemic levels

title: The couple who travel the world house sitting
description: Traveling around the world while staying in other people's homes for free might sound too good to be true. But a semi-retired couple from Norfolk, England have managed to do just that.

title: Here's why LGBTQ+ people are worried about the Beijing Winter Games
Some people in a cheering crowd called for her to be raped. Many were women
description: Her hair was cut off and her face painted black before she was paraded into the street where some people in a cheering crowd called for her to be raped.

title: Boris Johnson is in serious trouble. His party doesn't know what to do with him
description: What will it take to finish him off? That's the question that close observers of Boris Johnson's premiership have been asking for weeks.

title: Couple and dog rescued via helicopter after being stranded in California cabin for two months
description: Two people who were looking after a cabin in a remote part of California were rescued this week after being snowed in for two months and  facing a dwindling food supply, officials said Friday.

title: Pence: Trump 'wrong' to say I had right to overturn election
description: Former Vice President Mike Pence called out his former boss by name on Friday, saying that "President (Donald) Trump is wrong" in claiming that Pence had the right to overturn the 2020 election on January 6, 2021.

title: US restores Iran sanctions waiver as time running out to salvage nuclear deal
description: The Biden administration has restored a sanctions waiver that will allow countries to cooperate with Iran on civil nuclear projects, two senior US officials said Friday, a move that comes as US officials warn that there are only weeks left to salvage the 2015 Iran nuclear deal.

title: Jury finds Waffle House shooter guilty of all 16 counts, including eight counts of first degree murder
description: A jury found Travis Reinking guilty of all 16 counts, including eight counts of first degree murder in the April 2018 shooting at a Waffle House in Antioch, Tennessee, according to a live video feed provided by CNN affiliate WSMV.

title: Suspected Chinese hackers hit News Corp with 'persistent cyberattack' in January
description: News Corp suffered a "persistent cyberattack" in January, the company said Friday, and investigators believe Chinese spies may be responsible.
